alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern La Salle County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Triumph, moving north at 20 mph. More strong storms were developing near Earlville in this area. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Earlville, Triumph, Prairie Center and Harding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
